/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, their colors muted under the overcast sky. The road itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. In the distance, a large billboard stands out, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise serene landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of an overcast day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image exudes a certain charm, offering a glimpse into the everyday life of this bustling city.
